Text: Next Prev Swipe left/right Watch Lab MP claim that “The Government is hurtling towards a chaotic breakfast”   The brexit / breakfast slip strikes again and this time for Shadow Chancellor of the Exchequer John McDonnell . "Hurtling towards a chaotic breakfast" https://t.co/s451F9ixoP   — Sean Clare (@Sean__Clare) October 27, 2016   The question is: is this chaotic breakfast going to be hard or soft?
